title: Donna Eden - Energy Healing
description:
Donna Eden - Energy Healing

Energy Healing 6-Hour Program
with Donna Eden

The six-hour video training series is designed to supplement the book and it also stands alone. It brings Donna's energy into your living room, making the self-care techniques presented in the book COME ALIVE with clear instructions and vivid demonstrations. It is a very well-organized and easy to follow presentation of the basic methods used in energy medicine.
Feedback we have received consistently is that people never expected to get such tremendous value and so much useful information from a few videos.  DVD or VHS

An Overview of the Topics Covered in the 3-Video Series:

   * Energy Testing
   * The Daily Routine
   * Neurolymphatic Reflex Points
   * Neurovascular Points
   * The Aura
   * Energy Cross-Overs
   * Tracing the Meridians
   * Rebalancing a Meridian by:
         o Stretching its Alarm Point
         o Flushing it
         o Massaging its Neurolymphatic Points
         o Holding its Neurovascular Points
         o Holding its Acupuncture Strengthening Points
         o Correcting Homolateral Energies
         o The Ileocecal Valve



   * Alarm Points
   * The Diaphragm
   * Nuances of Energy Testing
   * Surrogate Testing
   * The Immune System: Triple Warmer/Spleen
   * The Chakras
   * The Five Rhythms
   * Energy Techniques for Reducing Pain
   * Relief from a Tension Headache
   * Eye Pattern Reprogramming for Releasing Stored Stress
   * Healing the Eyes
   * Tapping Fear Out of Your Body
   * Tapping Joy into Your Body
   * Reprogramming Your Physical and Emotional Habits
